element.name: Friend of the Forest
element.description: After spending some time in forests, you have attuned yourself to the ways of the woods and the creatures in it. You learn the treeheal (see the Magic and Spells chapter) cantrip and two other druid cantrips of your choice. You also learn the speak with animals spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot. Once you cast it, you must finish a resting before you can cast it in this way again. Your spellcasting ability for these spells is Wisdom.

element.name: Stunning Sniper
element.description:
Prerequisite: Proficiency with a ranged weapon
You have mastered the use of ranged weapons to cripple your target from a distance. When you score a critical hit on a ranged attack roll, you can stunned the target until the start of your next turn instead of doubling the damage.
